About

An Undergradute Research Society, first of it's Kind

Research is all about experiencing multidisciplinary interests discovering facts, and forming new opinions. Undergraduate Research is recognised worldwide, and it provides students with a wide range of exposure, opportunities, and career paths. Undergraduate research is vital in this new era, where young minds give their ideas and contribute to society in various forms. The Bennett Undergraduate Research Society (BURS) is an initiative taken up by the undergraduate students of BU to promote UG Research. We are performing this research under the collaboration of professionals, mentors, and our very own esteemed faculty members, who will be there to guide you throughout this journey of enlighteningÂ research.
